file.string:
SELECT
 _id FROM
 entries
 WHERE
 downloaded = 0 AND (
 read_state < 1 OR
 starred_state > 0 OR
 entries.type = "N")

UPDATE
 entries
 SET
 read_state = 1, 
 read_state_pending = read_state_pending * -1 + 1
 -- END-OF-UPDATE
 WHERE
 read_state = 0 AND
 INSERTED_AT > ? AND
 -- D_L --
 rowid IN 
 (SELECT 
 entries.rowid
 FROM 
 entries
 
 -- feeds-needed
 ,feeds
 -- feeds-needed-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels
 -- labels-mark-end
 
 WHERE
 entries.read_state = 0
 AND entries.starred_state > ?
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ? 
 
 -- feeds-needed
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id
 -- feeds-needed-end
 

-- feeds-mark
 AND feeds._id = ?
 -- feeds-mark-end
 
 -- notification-feeds-mark
 AND feeds.NOTIFICATION > 0
 -- notification-feeds-mark-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 AND (lower(labels.name) = ? 
 AND entries._id = elas.ENTRY_ID AND elas.LABEL_ID = labels._id)
 -- labels-mark-end 
 --LIMIT-- 
)

SELECT 
 entries._id,
 entries.ATOM_ID,
 entries.ALTERNATE_URL,
 entries.CONTENT,
 entries.CONTENT_TYPE,
 entries.CONTENT_URL,
 entries.TITLE,
 feeds.title as derived_feed_title,
 feeds.DOWNLOAD_PREF,
 feeds.DISPLAY_PREF,
 entries.FEED_ID,
 entries.READ_STATE,
 entries.READ_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.STARRED_STATE,
 entries.STARRED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.LIKED_STATE,
 entries.LIKED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.SHARED_STATE,
 entries.SHARED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.PINNED_STATE_PENDING,
 entries.UPDATED_UTC,
 entries.DOWNLOADED,
 entries.ERROR
, entries.ENTRY_HASH,
 feeds.JS_ENABLED
, feeds.FTW_ENABLED
, entries.SHARED_BY_FRIEND
, entries.NOTE
, entries.SNIPPET
 FROM
 feeds,
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels
 -- labels-mark-end
 WHERE read_state < ?
 AND entries.INSERTED_AT > ?
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id
 AND entries.starred_state > ?
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ? 


 -- feeds-mark
 AND feeds._id = ?
 -- feeds-mark-end
 
 -- notification-feeds-mark
 AND feeds.NOTIFICATION > 0
 -- notification-feeds-mark-end
 
 -- labels-mark
 AND (lower(labels.name) = ? 
 AND entries._id = elas.ENTRY_ID AND elas.LABEL_ID = labels._id)
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 ORDER BY
 entries.UPDATED_UTC

CREATE VIEW\n dashboard_view\n AS\n SELECT _id, ord, SUM(read_freq) AS sum_read_freq, SUM(unread_freq) AS sum_unread_freq, SUM(read_freq+unread_freq) AS sum_freq
FROM(
SELECT lower(labels.name) AS _id, 50 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries, entry_label_associations AS elas, labels
WHERE entries.read_state = 1 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id AND elas.label_id = labels._id
GROUP BY labels._id
UNION
SELECT lower(labels.name) AS _id, 50 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries, entry_label_associations AS elas, labels
WHERE entries.read_state < 1 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id AND elas.label_id = labels._id AND lower(labels.name) <> \"pinned\"
GROUP BY labels._id\n ---\n
UNION
SELECT \"all articles\" AS _id, -100 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"all articles\" AS _id, -100 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.read_state < 1\n
---\n UNION
SELECT \"my recently starred\" AS _id, -6 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.starred_state = 1 AND entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"my recently starred\" AS _id, -6 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.starred_state = 1 AND entries.read_state < 1 \n
---\n UNION
SELECT \"notes\" AS _id, -8 AS ord, COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 0 AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.type = \"N\" AND entries.read_state = 1
UNION
SELECT \"notes\" AS _id, -8 AS ord, 0 AS read_freq, COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
FROM entries
WHERE entries.type = \"N\" AND entries.read_state < 0 \n )
GROUP BY ord, _id;
UPDATE entries SET -STATE- = -SET- WHERE entries.-STATE- = -CLEAR- AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.entry_hash = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND -STATE_PENDING- = 0

SELECT _id AS _id, sum_unread_freq AS frequency, sum_unread_freq, ord
FROM dashboard_view
WHERE sum_unread_freq > 0
DELETE FROM temp_ids WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM entries WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id )
SELECT ATOM_ID FROM temp_ids_READ_HASHES ORDER BY TIMESTAMP
DELETE FROM temp_ids WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM entries WHERE entries.entry_hash = temp_ids.atom_id )

SELECT
 _id
, atom_id
 FROM
 entries
 WHERE
 read_state_pending = 0 
 AND starred_state_pending = 0 
 AND shared_state_pending = 0 
 AND liked_state_pending = 0 
 AND pinned_state_pending = 0
 AND NOT (note_submitted_state = 0 AND note IS NOT null)
 -- MARK BEGIN 
 AND read_state = 1 
 -- MARK END 
 
 -- Starred Articles
 AND (entries.atom_id NOT IN ( 
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.starred_state = 1 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?1) 
 
 -- Shared Articles
 AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.shared_state = 1 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?2) 
 
 -- Notes
 AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 WHERE 
 e2.type = "N" 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.read_state ASC
, e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?3) 

AND entries.atom_id NOT IN (
 SELECT 
 e2.atom_id 
 FROM 
 entries e2 
 ORDER BY 
 e2.UPDATED_UTC DESC 
 LIMIT ?4) 
 )

ORDER BY
 READ_STATE DESC
, -- prefer to delete read over unread over pinned 
 UPDATED_UTC ASC
UPDATE entries SET read_state = 1 WHERE entries.read_state = -1 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0
UPDATE entries SET read_state = 1 WHERE entries.read_state = -1 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.entry_hash = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0
UPDATE entries SET -STATE- = -SET- WHERE entries.-STATE- = -CLEAR- AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND -STATE_PENDING- = 0

SELECT
 _id,
 -- read-all-mark
 SUM(read_freq+unread_freq) AS frequency,
 -- read-all-mark-end
 -- read-unread-only-mark
 SUM(unread_freq) AS frequency,
 -- read-unread-only-mark-end
 SUM(unread_freq) AS sum_unread_freq,
 ord
, feed_id
 
 FROM(
 SELECT
 "all articles" AS _id,
 -100 AS ord,
 COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 
 0 AS unread_freq
, -1 as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 WHERE 
 entries.read_state = 1
 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 UNION

SELECT
 "all articles" AS _id,
 -100 AS ord,
 0 AS read_freq, 
 COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
, -1 as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 
 
 WHERE 
 entries.read_state < 1
 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 
 

UNION

SELECT 
 lower(feeds.title) AS _id,
 0 AS ord, 
 COUNT(*) AS read_freq, 
 0 AS unread_freq
, feeds._id as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries, 
 feeds 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 

WHERE 
 entries.read_state = 1 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id 
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 

GROUP BY 
 feeds.title, feeds._id
UNION

SELECT 
 lower(feeds.title) AS _id,
 0 AS ord, 
 0 AS read_freq, 
 COUNT(*) AS unread_freq
, feeds._id as feed_id
 
 FROM 
 entries, 
 feeds 
 -- labels-mark
 ,entry_label_associations as elas,
 labels 
 -- labels-mark-end 

WHERE 
 entries.read_state < 1 AND entries.read_state < ?1
 AND feeds._id = entries.feed_id 
 AND entries.starred_state > ?2
 AND entries.friends_shared_state > ?3 

-- labels-mark
 AND lower(labels.name) = ?4
 AND entries._id = elas.entry_id
 AND elas.label_id = labels._id
 -- labels-mark-end 

GROUP BY 
 feeds.title, feeds._id)
 

GROUP BY ord, _id, feed_id

DELETE FROM entries WHERE type = "N" 
 AND read_state_pending = 0 
 AND starred_state_pending = 0 
 AND shared_state_pending = 0 
 AND pinned_state_pending = 0 
 AND NOT (note_submitted_state = 0 AND note IS NOT null)
 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM temp_ids WHERE entries.atom_id = temp_ids.atom_id ) AND read_state_pending = 0; DELETE FROM temp_ids

CREATE VIEW entries_view AS SELECT entries._id AS _id, ENTRY_HASH, STORAGE_LOCATION, entries.ATOM_ID as ATOM_ID, ALTERNATE_URL, CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_URL, entries.TITLE AS TITLE, FEED_ID, READ_STATE, READ_STATE_PENDING, STARRED_STATE, STARRED_STATE_PENDING, SHARED_STATE, SHARED_STATE_PENDING, PINNED_STATE_PENDING, FRIENDS_SHARED_STATE, UPDATED_UTC, DOWNLOADED, ERROR, feeds.TITLE as FEED_TITLE, DOWNLOAD_PREF, DISPLAY_PREF, feeds.ATOM_ID as FEED_ATOM_ID, AUTHOR, feeds.JS_ENABLED AS JS_ENABLED, SHARED_BY_FRIEND, TYPE, NOTE, NOTE_SUBMITTED_STATE, NOTE_SHOULD_BE_SHARED, feeds.ALT_URL AS FEED_ALTERNATE_URL, LIKED_STATE, LIKED_STATE_PENDING, feeds.FTW_ENABLED AS FTW_ENABLED, SNIPPET FROM feeds, entries WHERE feeds._id = entries.feed_id ORDER BY entries.UPDATED_UTC DESC

SELECT _id AS _id, sum_freq AS frequency, sum_unread_freq, ord
FROM dashboard_view
WHERE frequency > 0

GrazeRSS would like to anonymously collect your usage data using flurry.com. This data will help the developer understand how you use GrazeRSS so that he can improve it.
 
This data collection is strictly opt-in, so if you do not approve no data will be collected. The application will continue to function normally regardless of this setting.
 
Currently, only general data will be collected: what device you use, your GrazeRSS and Android versions, which country you are in, which GrazeRSS screens you use and how long you use each screen.
 
In the future, more specific data may be collected, such as which menu options you use most frequently, GrazeRSS configuration information, etc. Before this happens however, this dialog will appear again and ask you again to allow this data to be gathered.
 
At any time you may open the settings and enable or disable the data collection.
 
Tip:
 
It is recommended to enable the usage data collection.
If you use GrazeRSS in any unusual way, or use a rare device or Android version, this is your opportunity to make the developer aware of it so that he can better support you.
Show Zoom Controls in the embedded browser.
Show hovering buttons to flip through the articles.
Logging out and clearing the local cache of articles headers and bodies.
What to synchronize and keep locally.

NewsRob kept compatibility with old Android versions for quite some time and to some extent will continue to do so.
 
However this comes at a cost and as meanwhile there are only a few users left who use NewsRob on Android 1.5 - 2.0.1 devices, this cost became harder and harder to justify over the last releases.
 
To pick up speed with development the support for the older Android versions will be dropped from the main version of NewsRob.
 
However to make sure that you are still able to install NewsRob and get an update when I discover a very critical bug, a new version of NewsRob is on the Android Market for devices running older versions of the Android OS.
 
Please install the new version using the button below.
 
You then need to uninstall the current version of NewsRob.
 
If you have the Pro version of NewsRob this will also be recognized by the new version.
 
Also your per-feed settings will be picked up by the new version, but you need to login again and configure the basic parameters.
 
Thanks! Waiting for you on the other side.
Service Provider to use for synchronization. Changing this will log you out from the current provider and clear your cache.
A multi-platform offline\nnews client for Android
Select the color scheme of GrazeRSS.
Show a notification while a sync is running.
Pick a sound to notify of new articles.
Flash LED to notify of new articles.
Notifications need to be enabled per feed also.
Change by logging out You will be prompted for the new account when refreshing.
Camera Button toggles an article between read and unread.
An update of GrazeRSS is available!
The storage provider for the downloaded content.
Download article content including images for offline use.
Default Sort Order in Article List: Newest on the top?
A new version of GrazeRSS is available!
Swipe L-T-R to mark article read, R-T-L to mark unread.

Tip:

You can enter / leave the full screen mode by tapping twice in the content area (the article body).
Vibrate phone to notify of new articles.
%s unread articles will be marked as read.

You selected to store articles and images on an SD card.

 Currently there is no accessible SD card available.

 Possible reasons:

 - No SD card inserted
 - SD card used as USB mass storage
 - SD card is almost full
 - SD card is read-only

 Impact:
 Until the SD card is accessible again GrazeRSS cannot synchronize or display downloaded articles.

 Resolution:
 Make the SD card accessible to continue using GrazeRSS or set Storage Provider to Phone Memory in the settings.
Flip through the articles using the volume controls.

Login to $SERVICE$ needed

GrazeRSS will connect to $SERVICE$. Therefore your username and password is needed.

You can decide if your password should be stored on this device. Otherwise you will be asked again for your credentials every sync.

If you haven\'t used $SERVICE$ before, please visit $SERVICE_URL$ and set up an account.
Swipe L-T-R to mark article read, R-T-L to mark unread.
Number of articles that are to be synced and kept locally.
Not only for login, but for all communications with the server. Not for the websites though.
This default can be overwritten on a per feed basis.
Clearing the local cache of articles headers and bodies.
Additional notes to be synced and kept locally.
When navigating with vol up/down, vibrate when there are no more articles
No articles yet.\n\nSync to load content.
Default text size in the browser
How often should GrazeRSS sync and download content?

Login needed 

 Your session expired and you need to login again!

 You can decide if your password should be stored on this device. Otherwise you will be asked again for your credentials every two weeks.
Additional shared articles to be synced and kept locally.
There has been a problem while logging you in.\n\n

Sorry!

There was not enough memory to complete the operation.

You already closed the app (force closed), now press OK and GrazeRSS will be restarted. Please try again then what you just did.
It should work now.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

If this should happen on a regular basis and you can reproduce it, I would like to hear about it: travis@tabbal.net.
The server has sent a response that GrazeRSS cannot parse (yet).
Reflow text when zooming the article.
Next synchronization\n starts in three minutes.
Additional starred articles to be synced and kept locally.
Ask when >= x articles would be marked as read.
